titleStmt.title: The Saints travel to the land of Canaan Wherein is discovered seventeen false rests below the spirituall coming of Christ in the Saints. Together with a brief discovery of what the coming of Christ in the spirit is; who is the alone rest and center of spirits. By R. Wilkinson. A member of the army.
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, Robert, member of the Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, at the black spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the black spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls
